title: Sono-responsive smart nanoliposomes for precise and rapid hemostasis application
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,15491-15498
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08445K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Qian Zhang, Lichao Zhu, Kaiyang Wang, Song Chen, Yijiong Zhang, Wei Song, Long Qin, Xijian Liu, Yu Luo, Jian Wan
A sono-responsive smart nanoliposome loaded with thrombin (TNL) was developed. The structure of TNL collapses under ultrasonic activation and swiftly releases thrombin from the cavity, thereby achieving a precise and rapid local hemostasis.
